meanings.definition: A type of printing process used for reproducing written or graphic material.
meanings.sent1: The ozalids helped create multiple copies of the important document.
meanings.sent2: The office used ozalids to duplicate the design for the presentation.
meanings.sent3: The ozalids decided to make more copies of the report for everyone to read.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like an ozalids, replicating ideas effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The ozalids hummed softly, producing exact replicas of the original artwork.

meanings.definition: Copies made using the ozalid process.
meanings.sent1: She collected the ozalids of the architectural plans for reference.
meanings.sent2: The ozalids of the blueprint were distributed to the team for review.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the stack of ozalids, creating chaos.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a shelf full of ozalids, storing past moments.
meanings.sent5: The ozalids gleamed under the light, showcasing the precision of the reproduction.
